com.gsd.pig.udf
クラス DateTimeConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<java.lang.String>
      com.gsd.pig.udf.DateTimeConverter

public class DateTimeConverter
extends org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<java.lang.String>

DateTimeConverter implements eval function to convert unix time to yyyymmdd.

Example:
A = load 'mydata' as (unixtime:chararray); B = foreach A generate DateTimeConverter(unixtime);
